name: Eventide PowerMAX V2
details:
Eventide PowerMAX, multi power supply.7 isolated outlets, each offering voltages 9, 12, 15 or 18V; High current 660mA @ 9V on the first 3; 4 outlets each selectable with either 9V, 12V, 15V, or 18V up to 660mA; Powers multiple Eventide, Strymon or other high current pedals; 24V DC-AUX output for the PowerMINI extension; USB outlet for charging a smartphone or tablet; 100V, 120V or 230V mains operation for worldwide use; Ultra-low noise, no mains transformer hum; Advanced LED monitoring of each outlet; Extremely low profile, only 25mm (1 inch) thick, 13 Flex cables included, 5 for Eventide pedals; Optional CIOKS GRIP (patent pending) for easy mounting with Pedaltrain; Pedaltrain and Templeboards compatible; Includes mounting screws and template;
https://www.eventideaudio.com/products/accessories/power-supply/powermax
